original_title: Watchers 1: UFOs are Real, Burgeoning, and Not Going Away
overview: LA Marzulli examines the leading questions about UFOs, entities, and related unexplained mysteries in this video documentary, with special guest Dr. Roger Leir, the surgeon who has removed implants from 16 patients.
tagline: UFOs are Real, Burgeoning, and Not Going Away
title: Watchers 1: UFOs are Real, Burgeoning, and Not Going Away
